Action.author: ynamiki
Action.body: ~jyellick , I have a question about your code. Could you please check the description of this issue?

Action.author: jyellick
Action.body: Yes, this looks like a bug to me. In practice, all orderer operations have a channel context associated with them, which sets the TLS certificates as well, but, if we are bothering to build this set of TLS CAs, we should be referencing them.

Action.author: ynamiki
Action.body: Thanks, I will submit a patch.

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: Fixed in master branch. I don't think there is any need for this in v1.4.x LTS release.
